name: @darna-digital/composable-fetcher
description: Builder-based HTTP fetcher with Standard Schema validation, typed error decoding, composable error handling with retry, and observability.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:dry: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --access public --dry-run
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release

author: Darna Digital
